artworks.title: Mrs. Philip Lydig
artworks.description:
Commissioned by Rita de Acosta Lydig (Mrs. Philip M. Lydig) [1880-1929], New York; her estate; (sale, Plaza Art Galleries, Inc., New York, 27 February 1931, no. 73); Chester Dale [1883-1962], New York;[1] bequest 1963 to NGA.

[1] "86 Paintings...," _Times_ (1931): 12; "Paintings...," _Art News_ (1931): 19.
